languages.text: "И я совсем не понимаю, что происходит! Я так... растерялась". {n}Мейв неморгающими глазами смотрит на растерзанный труп Руолдо.{/n} "Может, все это — ужасный кошмар? И я просто сплю? На секунду мне показалось... Нет, простите, не может быть".

traits.locale_text: "И я совсем не понимаю, что происходит! Он был так беспомощен! Я так... растерялась". {n}Лидзи неморгающими глазами смотрит на растерзанный труп Руолдо.{/n} "Может, все это — ужасный кошмар? И я просто сплю?"

languages.text: "I have no idea what's going on! I'm so... confused." {n}Maive stares at Ruoldo's mauled corpse with unblinking eyes.{/n} "Is this just a horrible nightmare? Could it be I'm just dreaming? For a second there, I thought— No, I'm sorry. It's impossible."
languages.original_text: "И я совсем не понимаю, что происходит! Я так... растерялась". {n}Мейв неморгающими глазами смотрит на растерзанный труп Руолдо.{/n} "Может, все это — ужасный кошмар? И я просто сплю? На секунду мне показалось... Нет, простите, не может быть".

traits.locale_text: "And I have no idea what's going on! I'm so... confused." {n}Maive stares at Ruoldo's mauled corpse with unblinking eyes.{/n} "Could this be a horrible nightmare? Could it be I'm just dreaming? For a second there, I thought— No, I'm sorry. It's impossible."

"And I have no idea what's going on! I'm so... confused." {n}Maive stares at Ruoldo's mauled corpse with unblinking eyes.{/n} "Could this be a horrible nightmare? Could it be I'm just dreaming? For a second there, I thought— No, I'm sorry. It's impossible."

"And I have no idea what's going on! I'm so... confused." {n}Maive stares at Ruoldo's mauled corpse with unblinking eyes.{/n} "Is this just a horrible nightmare? Could it be I'm just dreaming? For a second there, I thought— No, I'm sorry. It's impossible."

"And I have no idea what's going on! I'm so... confused." {n}Maive stares at Ruoldo's mauled corpse with unblinking eyes.{/n} "Is this just a horrible nightmare? Could it be I'm just dreaming? For a second there, I thought— No, I'm sorry. It's impossible."

"I have no idea what's going on! I'm so... confused." {n}Maive stares at Ruoldo's mauled corpse with unblinking eyes.{/n} "Is this just a horrible nightmare? Could it be I'm just dreaming? For a second there, I thought— No, I'm sorry. It's impossible."

"I have no idea what's going on! I'm so... confused." {n}Maive stares at Ruoldo's mauled corpse with unblinking eyes.{/n} "Is this just a horrible nightmare? Could it be I'm just dreaming? For a second there, I thought— No, I'm sorry. It's impossible."

languages.text: 「何が起きてるのか、まったくわかりません！私…混乱していて…」{n}メイヴは、ずたずたにされたルオルドの死体を瞬きもせずに見つめた。{/n}「これはただの恐ろしい悪夢なの？夢を見ているだけなのかしら？ほんの一瞬だけ…いえ、ごめんなさい。そんなはずないわ」
languages.original_text: "I have no idea what's going on! I'm so... confused." {n}Maive stares at Ruoldo's mauled corpse with unblinking eyes.{/n} "Is this just a horrible nightmare? Could it be I'm just dreaming? For a second there, I thought— No, I'm sorry. It's impossible."

traits.locale_text: 「何が起きてるのか、まったくわかりません！私…混乱していて…」{n}メイヴは、ずたずたにされたルオルドの死体を瞬きもせずに見つめた。{/n}「これはただの恐ろしい悪夢なの？夢を見ているだけなのかしら？ほんの一瞬だけ…いえ、ごめんなさい。そんなはずないわ」

languages.text: "Neler döndüğüne dair en ufak bir fikrim yok! Kafam o kadar karışık ki..." {n}Maive, Ruoldo'nun parçalanmış cesedine gözlerini kırpmadan bakıyor.{/n} "Bu olanlar bir kâbustan mı ibaret? Rüya mı görüyorum? Bir anlığına sandım ki... Hayır, üzgünüm. Bu imkânsız."
languages.original_text: "I have no idea what's going on! I'm so... confused." {n}Maive stares at Ruoldo's mauled corpse with unblinking eyes.{/n} "Is this just a horrible nightmare? Could it be I'm just dreaming? For a second there, I thought— No, I'm sorry. It's impossible."

traits.locale_text: "Neler döndüğüne dair en ufak bir fikrim yok! Kafam o kadar karışık ki..." {n}Maive, Ruoldo'nun parçalanmış cesedine gözlerini kırpmadan bakıyor.{/n} "Bu olanlar bir kâbustan mı ibaret? Yoksa sadece rüya mı görüyorum? Bir anlığına sandım ki... Hayır, üzgünüm. Bu imkânsız."

languages.text: «¡No sé qué está pasando! Estoy muy... confusa». {n}Maive observa sin pestañear el cuerpo destrozado de Ruoldo.{/n} «¿Es esto una pesadilla? ¿Es un sueño horrible? Por un momento, me ha parecido... No, perdón. Es imposible».
languages.original_text: "I have no idea what's going on! I'm so... confused." {n}Maive stares at Ruoldo's mauled corpse with unblinking eyes.{/n} "Is this just a horrible nightmare? Could it be I'm just dreaming? For a second there, I thought— No, I'm sorry. It's impossible."

traits.locale_text: «¡No sé qué está pasando! Estoy muy... confusa». {n}Maive observa sin pestañear el cuerpo destrozado de Ruoldo.{/n} «¿Es esto una pesadilla? ¿Es un sueño horrible? Por un momento, me ha parecido... No, perdón. Es imposible».

languages.text: “我也不明白这到底是怎么回事！我真的是……不明所以。”{n}梅芙目不转睛地盯着罗尔多伤痕累累的尸体。{/n}“这会不会只是个可怕的噩梦？这会不会只是我在做梦？有那么一瞬间，我还以为——不，抱歉，这种事情是不可能发生的。”
languages.original_text: "I have no idea what's going on! I'm so... confused." {n}Maive stares at Ruoldo's mauled corpse with unblinking eyes.{/n} "Is this just a horrible nightmare? Could it be I'm just dreaming? For a second there, I thought— No, I'm sorry. It's impossible."

traits.locale_text: “我也不明白这到底是怎么回事！我真的是……不明所以。”{n}梅芙目不转睛地盯着罗尔多伤痕累累的尸体。{/n}“这会不会只是个可怕的噩梦？这会不会只是我在做梦？有那么一瞬间，我还以为——不，抱歉，这种事情是不可能发生的。”

languages.text: « Je n'ai aucune idée de ce qui se passe ! Je... je ne sais plus quoi penser. » {n}Maive fixe le cadavre meurtri de Ruoldo sans ciller.{/n} « Est-ce juste un affreux cauchemar ? Se pourrait-il que je sois en train de rêver ? L'espace d'un instant, j'ai cru que... Mais non, oubliez ce que j'ai dit. C'est tout bonnement impensable. »
languages.original_text: "I have no idea what's going on! I'm so... confused." {n}Maive stares at Ruoldo's mauled corpse with unblinking eyes.{/n} "Is this just a horrible nightmare? Could it be I'm just dreaming? For a second there, I thought— No, I'm sorry. It's impossible."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai aucune idée de ce qui se passe ! Je... je ne sais plus quoi penser. » {n}Maive fixe le cadavre meurtri de Ruoldo sans ciller.{/n} « Est-ce juste un affreux cauchemar ? Se pourrait-il que je sois en train de rêver ? L'espace d'un instant, j'ai cru que... Mais non, oubliez ce que j'ai dit. C'est tout bonnement impensable. »

languages.text: "Ich habe keine Ahnung, was los ist! Ich bin so ... verwirrt." {n}Maive starrt Ruoldos geschundenen Leichnam ungerührt an.{/n} "Ist das nur ein schrecklicher Albtraum? Kann es sein, dass ich nur träume? Eine Sekunde lang dachte ich ... nein, es tut mir leid. Das ist unmöglich."
languages.original_text: "I have no idea what's going on! I'm so... confused." {n}Maive stares at Ruoldo's mauled corpse with unblinking eyes.{/n} "Is this just a horrible nightmare? Could it be I'm just dreaming? For a second there, I thought— No, I'm sorry. It's impossible."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe keine Ahnung, was los ist! Ich bin so ... verwirrt." {n}Maive starrt Ruoldos geschundenen Leichnam ungerührt an.{/n} "Ist das nur ein schrecklicher Albtraum? Kann es sein, dass ich nur träume? Eine Sekunde lang dachte ich ... nein, es tut mir leid. Das ist unmöglich."
